{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SerComm |model=IP822LM |revision= |asin= |fcc_date=07/19/2005 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=Yes |availability=OEM |type=Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=P27IP822LM |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=AC |pwr_vac=true |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8510 |cpu2_brand=Intellon |cpu2_model=INT5200 |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8000 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none=true |flags=HomePlug 1.0 |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.101 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui= }} There is an ''[[Intellon]]'' INT5200A0 on board.
The default credentials are from the FCC submitted manual. :The default SSID may be '''default'''.
